abilities.desc: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed and gaining armor temporarily while it digests the creep. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep\'s abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.
abilities.name: Devour
abilities.notes: If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.

abilities.desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.
abilities.name: Scorched Earth
abilities.notes: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.

abilities.desc: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4.0 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target\'s Max HP as damage per second.
abilities.name: Infernal Blade

abilities.desc: Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.name: Doom
abilities.notes: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
